Methods

| Edit this page View Source

VoteChannel(ITextChannel)

Sets the specified text channel as the vote channel where all vote confirmations will be sent.

Declaration
[Cmd("VoteChannel")]
[Aliases("VoteChannel")]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageGuild)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task VoteChannel(ITextChannel channel)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ITextChannel channel

The text channel to set as the vote channel.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of setting the vote channel.
| Edit this page View Source

VoteMessage(string)

Sets a custom message to be sent when a user votes or previews the current vote message.

Declaration
[Cmd("VoteMessage")]
[Aliases("VoteMessage")]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageGuild)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task VoteMessage(string message = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string message

The custom message to set for votes. Use "-" to reset to the default message. If null, previews the current vote message.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of setting or previewing the vote message.
| Edit this page View Source

VotePassword()

Initiates a confirmation process for setting a new vote password, cautioning the user about its security.

Declaration
[Cmd("VotePassword")]
[Aliases("VotePassword")]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageGuild)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task VotePassword()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of setting a new vote password.
| Edit this page View Source

VoteRoleAdd(IRole, StoopidTime)

Adds a role to be granted to users when they vote, with an optional duration for the role to be automatically removed.

Declaration
[Cmd("VoteRoleAdd")]
[Aliases("VoteRoleAdd")]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageGuild)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task VoteRoleAdd(IRole role, StoopidTime time = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IRole role

The role to add as a vote reward.
StoopidTime time

The duration for which the role will be granted. Null for indefinite.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of adding a vote role.
| Edit this page View Source

VoteRoleEdit(IRole, StoopidTime)

Edits the duration for which a vote role is granted to users.

Declaration
[Cmd("VoteRoleEdit")]
[Aliases("VoteRoleEdit")]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageGuild)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task VoteRoleEdit(IRole role, StoopidTime time)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IRole role

The role to edit.
StoopidTime time

The new duration for the role to be granted.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of editing a vote role's duration.
| Edit this page View Source

Votes(IUser)

Displays the total number of votes cast by a specific user or the command invoker.

Declaration
[Cmd("Votes")]
[Aliases("Votes")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task Votes(IUser user = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IUser user

The user whose votes to count. If null, counts votes for the command invoker.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of displaying vote count.
| Edit this page View Source

VotesLeaderboard(bool)

Displays a leaderboard of users based on their vote counts, optionally filtering for votes within the current month.

Declaration
[Cmd("VotesLeaderboard")]
[Aliases("VotesLeaderboard")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task VotesLeaderboard(bool monthly = false)
Parameters
Type Name Description
bool monthly

Whether to filter the leaderboard for the current month's votes.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of displaying a vote leaderboard.
